revised_title: Neurotrophins and Sensory Neurons: Role in Development, Maintenance, and Injury
tldr: The article discusses the role of neurotrophins, including nerve growth factor, brain-derived neurotrophic factor, and neurotrophin-3, in the development, maintenance, and injury of sensory neurons. The authors explore how these factors influence the specification of neuronal phenotypes and the mechanisms by which neurotrophins may act in this context. They also examine the heterogeneity of sensory neurons and the impact of neurotrophins on their development and function.
